solution_line_template: The entire sq ft of the living room is LxW so the room is {length}x{width} = <<{length}*{width}={total_room_sq_ft}>>{total_room_sq_ft} sq ft
Tom has already put down {already_put_down} sq ft so he needs to put down {total_room_sq_ft}-{already_put_down} = {remaining_sq_ft} sq ft of flooring

The boxes contain {sq_ft_per_box} sq ft of flooring per box and he needs {remaining_sq_ft} more sq ft of flooring so he needs {remaining_sq_ft}/{sq_ft_per_box} = <<{remaining_sq_ft}/{sq_ft_per_box}={boxes_needed}>>{boxes_needed} more boxes
